about_the_game:
"Lunar Mirror" It is a horror suspense decryption game with the theme of Cthulhu in the research institute. Nishimura Qiren's girlfriend mysteriously disappeared on campus. With the help of his friends, Qiren discovered that the disappearance of his girlfriend was linked to the school's weird clubs that are keen on organizing "late night fellowship". As the investigation deepened, strange events happened one after another，The huge conspiracy behind it also slowly surfaced...
Why do school girls disappear one after another?
Why are boys so keen on the club's midnight activities?
What happened ten years ago?
What is the mysterious organization plotting on the ground?
All these unknowns require you to find the answer...
Game Features
The theme of this game combines Cthulhu and the campus theme, making the game plot not only the mystery of Cthulhu but also the relaxation of the campus theme
Throughout the game, we emphasize that players gradually enter the inextricable horror, so whether it is the plot or the scene picture, it will gradually collapse, allowing players to gradually bring them into the rich and mysterious world of the mirror of the moon
The game uses an alternate day and night mode to play the game, looking for clues to promote the plot during the day, and exploring and discovering the truth at night. While it can greatly enrich the game world view, it can also give players some time to breathe in the horror atmosphere
This game uses mental value to represent the state of the protagonist. In addition to reducing the damage you encounter again, the mental value may also change due to your choice of the plot. At the same time, the spiritual value is the character's field of vision.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Corei5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
  • Additional Notes: 只安装集成显卡的笔记本电脑可能会导致游戏崩溃。 为了更好的营造恐怖气氛，本游戏使用了一些灯光插件。 这导致游戏需要独立显卡才能正常运行 Laptops with only integrated graphics may cause the game to crash. In order to better create a horror atmosphere, this game uses some lighting plug-ins. This results in the game memory requiring at least a discrete graphics card to function properly
